429.description: Too many login attempts - Rate limit exceeded

message.example: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.

retry_after.description: Seconds until next attempt is allowed

post.description: Register a new user and return authentication token

post.summary: Import a book from Google Books only for admin
post.description: Import a book into the local database using its Google Books ID. If the book already exists, returns the existing record.

message.example: Book imported successfully from Google Books

404.description: Book not found in Google Books API

message.example: Book not found in Google Books API

google_books_id: The google books id field is required.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all books in the database

get.summary: Search books in Google Books only for admin
get.description: Search for books using the Google Books API. Returns paginated results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (book title, author, ISBN, etc.)

delete.description: Remove a book from the authenticated user's favorites list

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of the authenticated user's favorite books

post.description: Add a book to the authenticated user's favorites list

200.description: Book added to favorites or already in favorites

message.example: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
